name: smart-parking-backend
description: Backend API for MCD Smart Parking System

scripts.db:reset: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.db:init: mysql -u root -padmin123 -e "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS smartparking; USE smartparking; SHOW TABLES;"
scripts.db:info: mysql -u root -padmin123 -e "SHOW DATABASES; SELECT 'smartparking' AS database_name, COUNT(*) AS table_count FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = 'smartparking';"
